item.title: Yugabyte - Row Level Geo Partitioning
item.description: Lets have look at one of the most intresting features of YugabyteDB - Row Level Geo-distribution I have joined Yugabyte a while back. I have gone through many demos/samples. But one thing that caught my attention very early on was the geo-pinning the data. This capability can simplify compliance of data privacy laws, data sovereignty laws, etc. It can make the overall architecture of the application very simple. Here is my stab at this feature.
